p: Amongst the strongest filtered homoplasic sites (>15 change points on the tree), three are found within Orf1ab (nucleotide positions 11,083, 13,402, 16,887) and S (21575). We exemplify the strongest signal and our approach using position 11,083 in Fig. 3 and provide a full list of homoplasic sites, both filtered and unfiltered, in Tables S4â€“5. The strongest hit in terms of the inferred minimum number of changes required ( Fig. 3b-c) at Orf1ab (11,083, Codon 3606) falls over a region encoding the non-structural protein, Nsp6, and is also observed in our analyses of the SRA dataset (Table S7).
